tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT The) (NN heart)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN sponge)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NN emotion))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [sponge/NN nsubj>[heart/NN det>The/DT] cop>is/VBZ det>a/DT nmod:for>[emotion/NN case>for/IN] punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VB Choose) (NP (DT the) (JJ right) (NN thing) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB soak) (PRT (RP up))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Choose/VB dobj>[thing/NN det>the/DT amod>right/JJ acl>[soak/VB mark>to/TO compound:prt>up/RP]] punct>./.]
